lines.text: You're facing me, / I'm facing you, / Shall I look at you or love you? / How did this happen / That you became mine? / How shall I trust this?
I shattered, / Shattering, I went to pieces! / Your persistence rendered me helpless! / Your magic brought me here, o sorcerer! / I shattered, / shattering, I went to pieces...
[on Kiran's birthday, she is playing hide-and-seek with Sunil in a darkened house]

[sensing someone behind her]
Sunny? What are you doing?

[singing]
Your glance is magic / Your body, fragrance! / Whether you agree to it, / or deny it, / you are MINE, Kiran...!
